body.p: The Board considered whether to prescribe the order in which factors should be considered in selecting a measurement basis (for example, using a hierarchy or decision tree). However, the Board concluded that this would not be possible or desirable. The relative importance of the factors will depend on facts and circumstances. Indeed, in many cases it will be important to consider several factors when selecting a measurement basis.
